page.title: 16BASILDON NE: DRUG ADDICTION
page.content:
One of the dangers facing young people today is that of drug addiction. A menace which kills, the penalties for distribution are not severe enough to discourage the peddlers of death. Many in Basildon are addicts through ignorance, and the boredom and apathy brought about by unemployment.
Now it appears that children of junior school age are becoming addicted. They may be led into addiction by an older acquaintance, or by experimentation because it is a "grown-up" thing to do.
The numbers involved are difficult to estimate, but it is essential that children are educated, not to scare them, but to allow them to judge the dangers for themselves.
